name: Facts
0:
”Alexa open interesting facts”
”Alexa ask interesting facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell interesting facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interesting facts
des:
Ask for Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

 Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Facts" or "Alexa, open Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
